moves.1. e4: isn't him a dutch fan? dutch fans likes the bird.
moves.2... Nf6: Stealing his e pawn. Called the grinch defense. Bb2 is recommanded against it.

moves.13. Qc1 Nxh1: and he resigned. This game is a f2 sac and a double check and a fork. extremely instructional.
